name: Dark Muk

abilities.name: Sticky Goo
abilities.text: As long as Dark Muk is your Active Pokémon, your opponent pays 2 more Colorless Energy to retreat his or her Active Pokémon. This power stops working while Dark Muk is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sludge Punch
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

flavorText: Muks appear suddenly, spreading sludge everywhere. Whenever one appears in a city, panic ensues.

strengths: Sticky Goo makes retreating very expensive for opponent
weaknesses: Sticky Goo only works while Active

competitiveHistory: Dark Muk was a powerful disruptor. Sticky Goo adding 2 to the opponent's retreat cost could trap Pokemon that normally had low retreat costs. Combined with Gust of Wind to bring up a vulnerable Pokemon, Dark Muk could lock it in place while Poisoning it with Sludge Punch.

rulings.ruling: Sticky Goo adds 2 to retreat cost, so a Pokemon with retreat cost 1 would need 3 energy to retreat.
Pokemon with free retreat (0 cost) would need 2 energy to retreat when facing Dark Muk.
